title: Get the next date after a day of the week
sql:
select add_months ( date'2022-06-01', 1 ) add_mths,
       date'2022-06-01' + interval '1' month add_interval
from   dual;

ADD_MTHS       ADD_INTERVAL    
01-JUL-2022    01-JUL-2022   

select add_months ( date'2022-05-31', 1 ) add_mths,
       date'2022-05-31' + interval '1' month add_interval
from   dual;

ORA-01839: date not valid for month specified
